Recipe can be halved but you can still use the whole can of guava nectar. ; name: soy chicken ; ingredients: roasting chicken, light brown sugar, gluten-free soy sauce, butter ; preparation:Place chicken, skin side down, in 9x13 baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients in small saucepan and place over low heat until butter is melted. Stir to mix well. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove chicken again and add remaining broth, which has been mixed with cornstarch. Bring to a boil to thicken and return chicken to the pan, coating it well. ; name: chinese chicken ; ingredients: chicken parts, soya sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic, onion powder, dry mustard, pepper ; preparation:Put chicken in roaster. Place kabobs on rack, and cook 15-20 minutes or till done, turning and basting frequently with reserved marinade. ; name: honey glazed chicken kabobs ; ingredients: reduced-sodium soy sauce, honey, canola oil, prepared horseradish, steak seasoning, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, sweet red pepper, green pepper, onion ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the first six ingredients. name: raspberry pear crisp ; ingredients: pears, fresh raspberries, sugar, quick-cooking oats, honey, margarine, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Place pears in an 8-inch square baking dish coated with non-stick cooking spray. Sprinkle pears with raspberries and sugar. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Sprinkle over berries. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes or until pears are tender and mixture is bubbly. Serve warm. Excellent with vanilla ice cream, especially if you drizzle the juice over the ice cream. Diabetic exchange is 2 fruits. ; name: chunky pear and vanilla bars ; ingredients: honey, vanilla extract, rolled oats, dried cranberries, pears ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Heat honey in a saucepan, then add the vanilla and stir in the oats, cranberries, and pears. Press the mixture into a 7-inch square nonstick baking pan. Bake for 20 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then mark into 10 bars and let cool completely. ; name: roasted pears with brown sugar and vanilla ice cream ; ingredients: apple juice, dark brown sugar, unsalted butter, bosc pears, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange the pears cut side up in an 8-inch square glass baking dish. Whisk the apple juice and sugar in a small heavy saucepan over medium-high heat until the sugar dissolves. Whisk in the butter. Pour the sauce over the pears. Bake until the pears are crisp-tender and beginning to brown, basting occasionally with the juices, about 35 minutes. Spoon the pears onto plates. Top with ice cream. Drizzle with any juices and serve. The pears can also be served frozen. To do so, cool the pears, then place them in the freezer until frozen solid, about 8 hours. ; name: pear honey ; ingredients: pears, pineapple, lemon, juice and rind of, sugar ; preparation:Run the pears through a food chopper using fine blades. Combine all ingredients. Cook on low heat, stirring frequently, until the mixture is thick and clear. Pack in hot jars and seal. Process in a water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: spiced red pears in wine crock pot ; ingredients: pears, dry red wine, sugar, cinnamon stick, cloves, orange ; preparation:Peel and core your pears. Then cut in half lengthwise. Put them in your crock pot. Add the wine, the sugar, cinnamon stick, and cloves. Zest the orange and put all the zest in your crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours or until the pears are tender. Chill really well. ; name: poached pears in saffron citrus syrup ; ingredients: vanilla bean, saffron thread, superfine sugar, lemon rind, pears, biscotti ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Chop the olives finely, combine them with the capers and sprinkle this over the salad. ; name: vegan caesar salad dressing ; ingredients: dijon mustard, nutritional yeast flakes, almonds, garlic cloves, water, lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, white pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the mustard, nutritional yeast, almonds, and garlic. Make a paste. Whisk in the water, lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil and white pepper. I prefer to blend the ingredients together in a mini-blender or using a hand-held immersion blender for a creamier consistency. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Adjust seasonings if necessary. ; name: carrot and almond soup vegan ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, carrots, celery ribs, vegetable bouillon granules, fresh cilantro, fresh parsley, ground almonds ; preparation:Place the onions, garlic, carrots, and celery in a large saucepan. Add 1. 25 litres boiling water and the bouillon powder. Bring to a boil and add the herb stalks. Lower the heat and simmer for 30 minutes until vegetables are tender when pierced with a knife. Remover from the heat and allow to cool slightly. Strain, reserving the stock. Remove the herb stalks, then blend the vegetables in a food processor or with a hand-held blender until smooth. Return the mixture to the pan and add the ground almonds and enough of the reserved stock to make a soup-like consistency. Re-heat, then divide between warmed soup bowls and serve garnished with fresh cilantro and parsley. ; name: parsley and sumac salad ; ingredients: red onion, flat leaf parsley, salt, sumaq, lemon, juice of, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Chop of stems of parsley. Place apples in a glass baking dish. Stuff each of them as full as you can get them with the oatmeal mixture, sprinkling the remainder over the tops. Bake in a 425f oven for 20 min or till very soft. Serve while still warm with vanilla or caramel ice cream. ; name: yams and apples casserole ; ingredients: apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, pecans, yams, butter, miniature marshmallow ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Using electric mixer, beat first 5 ingredients in a medium bowl until fluffy. Line large baking sheet with foil. Place yams on sheet, bake until tender, 1 hour 10 minutes. Slit each lengthwise. Spoon 1 tbs of butter into each. Pass remaining butter separately. ; name: paul prudhomme s candied yams ; ingredients: unsalted butter, sweet potatoes, water, sugar, dark brown sugar, orange, lemon, cinnamon sticks, vanilla extract, mace ; preparation:Heat the butter in a 4-quart saucepan over high heat. When about half melted, add the remaining ingredients. Stir, cover, and cook over high heat until mixture comes to a strong boil, about 10 minutes. Stir then reduce heat and simmer covered 20 minutes. Remove from heat and discard cinnamon sticks. Orange and lemon slices can also be discarded if desired. Serve immediately, undrained. Can also be mashed. ; name: harvest baked apples ; ingredients: apples, quick oats, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. name: green veggies soup ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, broccoli florets, zucchini, green onions, chicken stock, pesto sauce, pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, brown the green beans in oil about 4 minutes at medium heat. Add remaining veggies and keep cooking 1 minute. Add chicken stock and pesto. Bring to boil and let simmer until the broccoli is tender, 2 to 3 minutes. Add pepper. ; name: tomato zucchini and rice soup ; ingredients: canola oil, garlic cloves, onion, stewed tomatoes, chicken broth, water, dried basil, pepper, long grain rice, zucchini ; preparation:Heat oil in saucepan. Add garlic and onions and cook and stir for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, broth, water, basil and pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Cover and simmer over low heat, about 20 minutes or until rice is cooked, stirring occasionally. Stir in zucchini, heat through 1 minute. ; name: potato and zucchini soup ; ingredients: onion, zucchini, potatoes, chicken stock cubes, cream, butter, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Chop vegies as roughly as you like. Saute with a tablespoon of butter. Add enough water to cover, add stock cubes. Cook until tender. Blend and mash the vegies. Add the cream to taste. Serve with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: green pea and potato soup ; ingredients: frozen peas, potatoes, chicken stock, water, olive oil, onion, garlic, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese. ; name: lima bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, diced tomatoes, pinto beans, frozen lima beans, brown sugar, salt, water, white kidney beans ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired. ; name: green bean zucchini and potato soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh green beans, cayenne pepper, zucchini, potato, italian parsley, italian-style tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. name: madras chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, canola oil, onion, juice, curry powder, mango chutney ; preparation:Saute chicken until slightly golden - about 3 minutes per side. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: frosty white grapes ; ingredients: seedless grapes, sour cream, granulated sugar, vanilla, butter, brown sugar ; preparation:Combine sour cream, granulated sugar, and vanilla. Add chilled grapes. Pour into serving dishes. Mix melted butter with brown sugar until syrupy. Drizzle syrup over grapes. Chill. ; name: mussels w white wine and creme fraiche ; ingredients: butter, onion, shallot, fresh thyme leaves, bay leaf, white wine, water, mussels, creme fraiche, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a wide skillet with a lid, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add onion and shallot, and stir until very soft and beginning to turn gold, about 5 minutes. Do not let them brown. Add thyme and bay leaf and stir. Add wine and 1 cup water and bring to a boil over high heat. Add mussels, cover, and cook until open, about 4 minutes. Transfer mussels to serving bowls with a slotted spoon and boil liquid in the pan until reduced to a sauce. Turn off heat and whisk in crme frache and salt and pepper to taste. Pour over mussels and serve with crusty bread. ; name: grape clusters ; ingredients: seedless grapes, premium white baking chocolate, honey-roasted cashews, fresh grape leaves ; preparation:Rinse grapes and drain well. Cut grapes into clusters of 3. Set on paper towels and let dry completely. Melt chocolate in the top of a double boiler over hot water. When completely melted, remove from heat. Place cashews in a shallow bowl. Holding the grape clusters by the stem, dip in the chocolate and allow excess to drain back into pan. Roll grapes gently in the cashews. Place grapes, stem side up, on waxed paper. Refrigerate until firm. Serve within 4 hours. Garnish with grape leaves if desired. ; name: sweet pickled grapes ; ingredients: seedless grapes, wine vinegar, water, oranges, juice of, cinnamon stick, cloves, sugar ; preparation:Put the wine vinegar, water, orange juice, cinnamon, cloves and sugar into a sauce pan, bring to the boil then set aside to cool. Wash the grapes, take them off their stalks and make sure you remove any remaining bits of stalk from the grapes. When the vinegar mixture is cool, remove the cinnamon stick. Take a clean jar and pack in the grapes. Pour the vinegar mixture into the jar to cover the grapes, then seal the jar tightly. Leave the jar in a cool dark place for 2 days before eating - i keep mine in the fridge, because i am not sure how well they keep if not chilled. Eat within 2 weeks of making. ; name: sole wrapped in grape leaves ; ingredients: sole fillets, grape leaves, shallot, cream, egg yolks, seedless grapes, butter, salt and pepper, white wine ; preparation:In a wide skillet with a lid, melt butter over medium-high heat. Transfer mussels to serving bowls with a slotted spoon and boil liquid in the pan until reduced to a sauce. Turn off heat and whisk in crme frache and salt and pepper to taste. Place grapes, stem side up, on waxed paper. Refrigerate until firm. Serve within 4 hours. name: sauteed chicken breasts w fresh herbs and ginger ; ingredients: peanut oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime, juice of, chicken broth, fresh gingerroot, fresh basil leaf, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook, turning once, until firm to the touch, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add the lime juice to the skillet, and scrape up any browned bits that cling to the pan with a wooden spoon. Add the chicken broth and ginger, and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add the basil and mint to the pan and swirl the pan to combine. Spoon the herb sauce over the chicken. ; name: easy and basic boneless chicken breasts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, salt, boneless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, chicken broth, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off. ; name: easy garlic chicken breasts ; ingredients: lime juice, olive oil, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt & pepper ; preparation:In a medium bowl, whisk together the lime juice, olive oil, and garlic. Season with salt and pepper generously, and add chicken, making sure it is well-coated with the marinade. Marinate chicken, covered in fridge for at least 3 hours and preferably overnight. Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Remove chicken from marinade and discard marinade. Arrange chicken breasts in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper and roast for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear when you prick it with a fork. ; name: italian herbed grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian dressing, oregano, lemon pepper, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:Mix mayo and seasonings. We usually grill 4 minutes, brush & flip then 4 minutes two times each side -- if that makes any sense. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: egg in a tomato ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, egg, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cut off a thick slice at the stem end of a medium-size tomato. Set aside. Scoop out seeds and centre pulp. Place tomato in a small bowl. Add butter inside the tomato. Break an egg inside the tomato. Pierce yolk with a toothpick or fork. Sprinkle cheese over the egg. Place top slice over tomato. Microwave on medium-high for 1minute 45 seconds, or until egg is almost cooked. Let stand 1 minute. ; name: buttered tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, salt and pepper, sugar, basil ; preparation:Peel tomatoes and remove pulp and seeds. Discard pulp and seeds. Dice the fleshy part of the tomatoes. Melt butter in a skillet. Saut tomatoes in the butter. Stir in the salt and pepper, sugar and basil. Cover and cook about 5 minutes. ; name: broccoli tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, frozen chopped broccoli, shredded cheddar cheese, dry breadcrumbs, celery, light mayonnaise, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Steam the broccoli in a small amount of water for about 3 minutes. Drain well. Combine broccoli with cheddar, breadcrumbs, celery, mayo, and salt. Take the stem off the top of each tomato. Carefully cut 5 wedges in each tomato without cutting all the way through the bottom - the wedges should stay connected at the bottom. Spoon equal amounts of the broccoli filling into each tomato. Gently press the wedges back toward the center of the tomato. Sprinkle each with some of the parmesan cheese. Place tomatoes in a shallow pan and bake at 325 degrees for about 25 minutes. ; name: cherry tomato crisp ; ingredients: sandwich bread, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, olive oil, garlic, sea salt, fresh pepper, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: cottage cheese stuffed tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, pepper, cottage cheese, seafood cocktail sauce, chervil ; preparation:Cut ends of tomatoes and remove insides. Dust with freshly cracked pepper. Mince chervil. Mix with cottage cheese, cocktail sauce. Stuff tomatoes with the mixture. Keep refrigerated until use. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: chinese cucumber soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, salt and pepper, cucumbers, sesame oil, mushrooms, rice vinegar, scallions, ginger powder ; preparation:Place the broth in a soup pot and bring it to a boil. Add the cucumbers, mushrooms, scallions, salt, and pepper. Cover the soup pot and cook gently over low-medium heat for 15 to 20 minutes. Blend the soup in a blender. Add the extra seasonings-sesame oil, vinegar and ginger- and blend well. Refrigerate the soup for a few hours and serve cold. Or reheat the soup and serve it hot as the chinese do. ; name: chilled cucumber avocado and shrimp soup ; ingredients: avocado, cucumber, chicken broth, plain low-fat yogurt, lime juice, salt, cooked shrimp, green onions, shrimp ; preparation:Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit. Wrap half the avocado in plastic wrap and set aside. Peel the other half of the avocado, then cut it into chunks. Place the avocado, cucumber, broth, yogurt, lime juice and salt in the bowl of a blender. Process until smooth and creamy. Transfer the mixture to a bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or until very cold. To serve, peel and dice the remaining avocado half. Stir the avocado into the soup along with the diced shrimp. Ladle the soup into 4 bowls, sprinkle with green onions and float a single shrimp on top of each. ; name: potato and cucumber soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, potato, chicken broth, water, cucumber, heavy cream, ear of corn, fresh parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving. ; name: chinese soup ; ingredients: oil, mushrooms, water, garlic clove, ramen noodles, sherry wine, lemon juice, tabasco sauce, green onion ; preparation:Fry mushrooms, and garlic in oil. name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: roasted cod with potatoes and olives ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper, cod fish fillets, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450f. On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with the garlic, rosemary, and 1 tbs oil. Season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately. ; name: cod with onions and chives kabeljau mit schnittlauch zwiebeln ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, onions, chives, oil, white wine, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Lightly fry onions and chives in oil and lightly salt. Serve with boiled potatoes. ; name: herb coated cod ; ingredients: butter, butter flavored cracker, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, dried basil, garlic powder, cod fish fillet ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13-inch x 9-inch x 2-inch baking dish. Crush butter-flavored crackers either in a ziploc bag with a rolling pin or bottle of sherry, or in a food processor. Melt butter over low heat, and place in a shallow bowl. In another bowl, combine the crackers, cheese and seasonings. Dip fillets in butter, then coat with crumbs. Place coated cod fillets in baking dish. At medium heat, in a small skillet, heat olive oil and brown the meatballs a few minutes. Add maple syrup, salt, pepper and let cook around 3 minutes more. Remove the skillet from the heat. In a saucepan, put tomato sauce and bring to boil. When it comes to boil, add meatballs, cover and simmer around 25 minutes. Serve on a bed of pasta. ; name: mushroom and wine steak sauce ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, onion, garlic, condensed beef broth, tomato paste, ground pepper, cornstarch, water, dry red wine ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat. ; name: cocktail meatballs in garlic butter sauce ; ingredients: ground beef, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, kosher salt, extra large egg, butter, minced garlic clove, flour, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. While biscuits bake, combine spread ingredients. Brush baked biscuits with garlic topping. ; name: easy cheddar bay biscuits like red lobster ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, old bay seasoning, milk, cheddar cheese, butter, garlic powder, parsley flakes ; preparation:Combine bisquick, milk, first old bay seasoning, and cheese. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: roasted herbed chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemon, fresh rosemary, garlic, white wine, butter, red potatoes, fresh green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Clean and dry chicken and place in the crockpot. Pour butter over chicken and rub with rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Add to crockpot the garlic cloves, wine, and potatoes. Add green beans. Place lemon wedges on top of the chicken. Cook on high 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours. ; name: herb roasted chicken ; ingredients: chicken, butter, lemon juice, dried oregano, dried rosemary, dried sage, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Put the chicken pieces into a roasting tin and add garlic cloves, lemon chunks and the thyme. Just roughly pull the leaves off the stalks, leaving some intact for strewing over later. Add the oil and using your hands mix everything together, then spread the mixture out, making sure all the chicken pieces are skin side up. Sprinkle over the white wine and grind on some pepper, then cover tightly with foil and put in the oven to cook, at flavour-intensifying low heat, for 2 hours. Remove the foil from the roasting tin, and turn up the oven to 200c and cook the uncovered chicken for another 30-45 minutes, by which time the skin on the meat will have turned golden brown and the lemons will have begun to scorch and caramelise at the edges. Serve soup hot in bowls, with chopped avocado and a dollop of sour cream on top, if desired. ; name: crock pot potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, bacon, cream cheese, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, water, milk, pepper ; preparation:Stir together the potatoes, onion and bacon in the crock pot. name: apple peanut crumble ; ingredients: cooking apples, brown sugar, flour, quick-cooking rolled oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, peanut butter ; preparation:Place apple slices in slow cooker. First, make the filling by placing all the ingredients in a large bowl and tossing gently with your fingers until the apple slices are evenly coated. Set aside for 10 to 15 minutes. Now make the topping by mixing the flour and brown sugar in a bowl. Add in the butter and rub in with your fingers until the mixture resembles coarse breadcrumbs. Next, add the hazelnuts to the topping mixture and, using your hands, toss until all the ingredients are well combined. Set aside. Very lightly grease the pie dish with butter. Transfer the apple mixture evenly into the dish. Using your fingers, sprinkle the brown sugar topping evenly over the apples. Place the dish on a baking sheet and bake for approximately 45 minutes, until the top is lightly golden. When ready, take it out of the oven and let it cool for about an hour. ; name: irish apple crumble ; ingredients: pastry dough, granny smith apples, sugar, cinnamon, all-purpose flour, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: chocolate crumb cake ; ingredients: crumb cake mix, sugar, milk, vanilla extract, dutch process cocoa, canola oil, eggs, butter, neufchatel cheese, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray a non-stick 8 inch round cake pan with non-stick cooking spray and set aside. Add cake mix and remaining ingredients for the cake to a medium sized mixing bowl. With electric mixer, beat on medium speed 2 minutes or until thoroughly mixed and batter is smooth. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes or until toothpick inserted off center comes out clean. Cool on a rack for 10 minutes, invert onto wire rack and cool completely before frosting. For the frosting, add all ingredients except milk to a medium size bowl. Beat until creamy adding milk 1 teaspoon at a time until desired spreading consistency. Garnish as desired, strawberries make a nice garnish. ; name: bread crumb cake ; ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, cold water, walnuts, soft breadcrumbs, baking powder, shortening, vanilla, egg whites ; preparation:Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon colored. Add sugar and water. Add the nuts, bread crumbs, baking powder, and shortening. Mix well. Add vanilla and fold in stiffly beaten egg whites. Bake in 2 greased layer cake pans in hot oven 15- 20 minutes. When cool, spread whipped cream, sweetened and flavored, between layers and on top of cake. ; name: blueberry crumb cake ; ingredients: sugar, shortening, egg, milk, flour, baking powder, salt, blueberries, butter, cinnamon ; preparation:Grease and flour a 9x9 or 7x11 pan. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan. ; name: yellow crumb cake ; ingredients: cake mix, milk, vanilla, eggs, canola oil, egg white, sugar, white corn syrup, red food coloring ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes or until toothpick inserted off center comes out clean. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: spaghetti and fried eggs ; ingredients: salt, thin spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking the pasta when the water boils. Combine garlic and 4 tablespoons of the oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Drain the pasta, and toss with the eggs and oil, breaking up the whites as you do. Season to taste, and serve immediately, with cheese if you like. ; name: ben s baked spaghetti ; ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, pizza sauce, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, pizza toppings ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. In a glass lasagna pan, mix spagetthi sauce and pizza sauce on the bottom, only a little bit so the noodles dont stick. Pour in boiled spaghetti with a little oil on it. Coat with remaining spaghetti and pizza sauce to cover noodles completely. Next apply generous amount of shredded mozzarella cheese. Add pizza toppings, and sprinkle with more cheese. Cover in tinfoil and bake 10-15 minutes. Remove tin foil and bake until cheese is golden brown. ; name: spaghetti cupcakes ; ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: pasta with leek bacon ; ingredients: butter, bacon, leeks, cream, pasta, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut bacon into 1cm cubes. Trim the leeks and cut in half length ways, rinsing any dirt out from beneath the layers. Cut the halves into thin strips length ways. Melt butter in frying pan and saute the bacon and leeks for about 5 - 6 minutes. Add cream, mix well and simmer for 2 - 3 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to packet instructions, then drain. Add the bacon and leek mixture to the hot pasta and season well. Mix together and serve immediately. Top with parmesan. ; name: dave s spaghetti and eggs ; ingredients: spaghetti, egg, milk, butter, bacon bits, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. name: instant pot asian pork chop ; ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, sesame oil, ginger, sriracha sauce, black pepper, hoisin sauce ; preparation:Heat instant pot on saute. Once hot, add the oil. Place the pork chops in the oil and brown both sides. Add the rest of the ingredients, close the lid, and pressure cook on manuel for 12 minutes. Let the instant pot do a natural pressure release. ; name: ranch marinated pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, ranch dressing, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, onion powder ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: sweet and spicy chili pork chops ; ingredients: boneless center cut pork chops, brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, chili paste with garlic, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, green onion, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add pork, cooking 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Remove pan from heat and let pork stand for 30 seconds. While pork cooks, combine brown sugar, soy sauce, chile paste, hoisin and rice vinegar in a small bowl. Pour sauce over the pork, scraping the pan to loosen the fond. Turn the pork over to coat. Serve garnished with the green onion slices. I had a couple of thick boneless chops sitting around, so i cut them into thin, flat slices and cooked as above. Then doubled the sauce ingredients, tossed it all together and served with saffron rice. A nice variation. ; name: slow cooked oriental pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, garlic clove, soy sauce, chicken broth, brown sugar, chili pepper flakes, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice. ; name: hoisin marinated pork chops ; ingredients: low sodium soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, boneless center cut pork chops, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. name: potato salad with cumin tourchi batata tunisia ; ingredients: potato, olive oil, harissa, salt, cumin, lemon, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water for 15 minutes or until tender but not too soft or mushy. Cool and peel, cut into cubes. Heat oil in a small skillet and add harissa, salt, cumin and lemon juice. Bring to a boil and boil for a few seconds. Pour over potatoes and toss. Refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight. Add the chopped cilantro or parsley just before serving. Stir it in or sprinkle on top as you wish. ; name: tunisian potato olive salad ; ingredients: baby potatoes, salt, sugar, paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, garlic cloves, oil-cured black olives, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Place the potatoes in a pot with water to cover. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Drain the potatoes, return them to the pan and shake in the dry pan for a few minutes, until thoroughly dry. Cut the potatoes into thick slices, several per potato, or into quarters. Place in a bowl and toss with the cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic and olives. Dress with the olive oil, lemon juice and salt. Refrigerate until ready to serve, or serve at room temperature. ; name: moroccan broad fava bean salad ; ingredients: broad beans, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic cloves, ground cumin, paprika, coriander, preserved lemon, black olives ; preparation:Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil. Meanwhile pod the beans, put beans into boiling water and boil for 2 mins. Drain and refresh under cold running water. Slip off and discard the outer skin of the bean. Put beans into heavy pan with the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, cumin and paprika, cook gently over low heat for about 10 mins. Season to taste with salt and pepper and leave to cool in the pan. ; name: moroccan tomato and capsicum salad ; ingredients: red capsicums, green capsicum, egg tomatoes, lemon juice, ground cumin, extra virgin olive oil, parsley, salt ; preparation:Quarter the capsicums, and remove the saeeds and membranes. Roast under a grill or in a very hot oven until the skin blackens and blisters. Place in a paper or plastic bag for about 10 minutes. Peel. Chop the capsicum coarsely. Drop the tomatoes into boiling water, count to ten, then drain and refresh in cold water. Peel and seed, then chop coarsely. Combine the capsicum and tomatoes in a bowl, add the combined remaining ingredients and mix well. ; name: chard salad morocco ; ingredients: swiss chard, vegetable oil, fresh garlic, paprika, ground cumin, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Place the chard in a large pot with water to cover. Drain the chard, return them to the pot and shake in the dry pan for a few minutes, until thoroughly dry. Cut the chard into thick slices, several per chard, or into quarters. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Let cool on rack or serve warm with cream. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. Seerve with lemon sauce or whipped topping. ; name: cinnamon apple waffles ; ingredients: flour, salt, cinnamon, baking powder, sugar, eggs, milk, butter, apple ; preparation:Sift flour, salt, cinnamon, baking powder, and sugar together. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: garden spaghetti ; ingredients: garlic cloves, green onions, canola oil, swiss chard, vegetable broth, fresh black pepper, kosher salt, spaghetti ; preparation:Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard. ; name: quick and easy clam sauce for pasta ; ingredients: onion, garlic, butter, flour, minced clams, milk, dry fettuccine, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute onion and garlic in butter. Blend in flour. Drain clams and reserve juices. Add minced clams and milk to the onion and garlic. Simmer 10 minutes, season with salt and pepper to taste. If you desire a thicker sauce, make a slurry of cornstarch and milk. Add a little at a time to the sauce, stirring, until the desired thickness. Use the reserved clam juices to thin the sauce if need be. Meanwhile, cook pasta al dente in boiling salted water. Serve sauce over pasta. Top with parsley. Pass grated parmesan. ; name: cheap easy clam sauce for pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, basil, garlic cloves, onion, crushed red pepper flakes, clams, margarine, milk ; preparation:Heat olive oil in small pan, and add garlic and the optional onions. Cook on medium about 3 minutes or until tender and lightly browned. Stir in the basil or parsley and optional red pepper flakes. Add the drained juice from the can of clams. Bring to a boil, and then reduce heat to low allowing to simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in the clams and the butter. Once butter is melted, add the optional milk or half and half and cook until heated through. Serve over spaghetti or linguine or other favorite pasta. ; name: seafood pasta ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, bay scallop, medium shrimp, garlic cloves, butter, onion salt, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place spaghetti into 2 quarts boiling water to which 2 heaping teaspoons salt has been added. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes or till your desired doneness. Drain and serve. Over medium heat, melt butter in saute pan, add garlic and remaining seasonings, stir. Microwave for 9 minutes, stopping to stir every 3 minutes. This can also be performed in a saucepan on the stovetop. Add the butter and vanilla into the mixture. Pour the thick mixture into the baked 8 inch pie shell and sprinkle the top with cinnamon. Serve at room temperature. ; name: chocolate old fashioned pie ; ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, sugar, salt, cornstarch, flour, cocoa powder, butter, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:Bake pie crust according to directions and let cool. Add soup, milk, and nutmeg. Warm and stir. Pour sausage mixture over chicken. Bake in 350f oven for 30-40 minutes. Serve over rice or egg noodles. ; name: crispy chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, buttermilk, garlic, hot sauce, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, cornstarch, salt, vegetable oil ; preparation:Flatten the chicken breasts between parchment paper or between plastic sheets. Mix the buttermilk with the hot sauce and the garlic, put the chicken covered in the buttermilk mixture in a non-metallic dish, marinate for at least two hours turning them over once. Mix the flour, cornmeal, cornstarch and seasoning in a shallow dish, take the chicken out of the marinade, let the buttermilk drip off, coat in the flour, coat the other breast then repeat the coating again starting with the first one. If you still see wet parts on the breasts, coat again. Put the chicken back in the fridge for at least half an hour. Discard the marinade. Heat the vegetable oil in a frying pan until it is pretty hot. Fry the breasts until golden brown on both sides, lower the temperature and fry them until they are done, approx 10 minutes in total depending on the thickness of the breasts. ; name: sticky marmalade chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, chicken stock, marmalade, fresh thyme leaves ; preparation:Season chicken with salt and pepper. name: potato and corn chowder ; ingredients: potatoes, bacon, onion, water, cream-style corn, milk, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Add onion to bacon drippings after bacon has been removed. Cook until lightly browned. Add water, diced potatoes, salt and pepper. Cook until potatoes are tender. Add corn, milk, and butter. Simmer until heated through or until ready to serve. Add cooked bacon when ready to serve. ; name: yankee salmon chowder ; ingredients: bacon, baking potato, onion, creamed corn, whole milk, salmon, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium pot, cook the bacon over medium heat until the fat renders. Transfer the bacon to a paper towel to drain, reserving 2 tablespoons fat in the pot. Add the potatoes and onion and cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, for 3 minutes. Stir in the creamed corn, milk and 1 cup water and bring to a simmer. Add the salmon, lower the heat and simmer until the potatoes are tender and the salmon is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Using a fork, break up the salmon into small chunks. Stir in the cooked bacon and season with salt and pepper. ; name: cheeseburger chowder ; ingredients: ground beef, celery, green pepper, onion, potatoes, beef bouillon cubes, water, flour, milk, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef in large pot. Drain off grease. Add potatos, onions, peppers, celery, salt and bouillon cubes. Pour in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Whisk flour into milk and slowly pour into pot with meat and vegetables. Stir until soup is thickened slightly. Mix in cheese and stir until melted. ; name: chunky salmon chowder ; ingredients: salmon, cream-style corn, water, potatoes, evaporated milk, onion, dried dill weed, lemon pepper seasoning, salt, butter ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat until hot. Add salmon and lemon-pepper seasoning, cook another 10 minutes. Stir in dill and serve. ; name: cheddar chicken chowder ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, garlic clove, salt, pepper, flour, chicken broth, milk, frozen mixed vegetables, hot sauce, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray large saucepan with cooking spray. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: glazed bacon ; ingredients: bacon, flour, brown sugar, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Line cookie sheet with parchment paper to keep from sticking. Combine flour, sugar and pepper in a gallon plastic bag. Put one bacon slice at a time in bag and shake to coat well. Place bacon on the cookie sheet so they are not touching each other. Bake for 30-40 minutes at 300 degrees. Drain on paper towels. ; name: chicken and rice with bacon ; ingredients: chicken pieces, bacon, rice, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, milk, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Line large baking dish with bacon. Pour rice evenly over top of bacon. Place chicken on top of rice. Season chicken with salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and paprika. Mix together soup, broth, milk and pour over chicken and rice. Cover and bake for 3 hours at 325. Uncover and bake for 15 minute more. ; name: bacon and rice creole ; ingredients: bacon, green bell pepper, onions, salt, canned tomatoes, brown rice ; preparation:Simmer vegetables and spices in a saucepan. At the same time, fry the bacon. When bacon is done, remove from pan and crumble into small pieces. Drain off all fat. Let rice brown lightly. Add the vegetables and bacon. Let simmer over very low heat for 30 minutes. Check after 20 minutes to see if it is drying out. If so, add more tomatoes, or some water, or a combination of both. ; name: sweet and spicy bacon ; ingredients: brown sugar, cayenne, black pepper, bacon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: roasted butternut squash with lime and rosemary ; ingredients: butternut squash, butter, olive oil, lime juice, fresh rosemary, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel squash and cut into cubes about 1 inch square. Put squash into plastic mixing bowl, add olive oil, lime juice, and minced rosemary and toss well so squash is all coated with oil. Arrange squash on roasting pan in single layer. Dot with butter. Roast for 40-50 minutes, turning several times, or until squash is quite softened and getting browned on the edges. Season with sea salt and fresh ground black pepper, and serve hot. ; name: herb roasted butternut squash and sausages ; ingredients: butternut squash, chicken sausage, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh rosemary, fresh sage, fresh thyme, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Combine squash and next 6 ingredients in large roasting pan. Toss to coat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Roast until squash is tender and sausage heated thoroughly, stirring once, about 30 minutes. Drizzle with vinegar and serve. ; name: butternut squash with garlic and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, butternut squash, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender. ; name: sweet savory butternut squash and wild rice saut ; ingredients: butternut squash, cooked wild rice, green beans, garlic cloves, shallot, olive oil, thyme, sage, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Warm oil in a large saut pan over medium heat. Place green beans and shallots in pan and cook 3 minutes. Add garlic, squash and herbs. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until beans are crisp but tender. Add rice and cook until heated through. Place pan on center rack in a preheated 400f oven and roast 45 minutes, until fork-tender. When squash is cool enough to handle, scoop out flesh and cut into cubes. ; name: spice roasted butternut squash with smoked sweet paprika ; ingredients: butternut squash, sweet paprika, garlic powder, onion salt, fresh ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: country style green beans with red potatoes ; ingredients: ham hock, green beans, onion, red potatoes, seasoning salt, ground black pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Place the ham hock and onion into a 4 quart dutch oven and fill half way full with water. Season water with salt, pepper and garlic powder and bring to a boil, then cover and simmer over low heat until meat falls off the bones, about 2 hours. Remove the bones and skin. Return the meat to the pot. Discard bones and skin. Add the green beans to the dutch oven and simmer for 20 minutes, then add the potatoes. Simmer for 10 to 15 minutes more, or until they can be easily pierced with a fork. ; name: southern green beans ham potatoes ; ingredients: ham hock, bacon, onions, salt, sugar, garlic, cayenne pepper, parsley, fresh green beans, potato ; preparation:Place ham hock and bacon in large dutch oven pot or soup pot. Wash beans, cut off ends and break in half. Add beans, salt, sugar, garlic, pepper and parsley to the ham hocks. Let it come to a boil, then turn burner to medium, to medium-low. Let it slow boil for about an hour or more or less, depending on how well you like your beans cooked. About 15-20 minutes before done, add your potatoes. Boil until tender. ; name: garden green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, fresh mushrooms, onions, garlic, olive oil, sliced water chestnuts, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. name: cajun fish fillets ; ingredients: paprika, garlic powder, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, olive oil, halibut fillets, lemon wedge ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine paprika, garlic powder, thyme, salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper and oil to make a paste. Remove fish to a serving plate and serve with lemon wedges. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: brown rice split pea laf ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, brown rice, vegetable broth, lemon juice, split peas, ground cinnamon, ground cumin, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the onion until golden, about 5 minutes. Cover and cook 45-50 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice and peas are tender. Add the peas and cook an additional 5 minutes. Add the lemon zest, salt, and pepper, and serve immediately. ; name: peas and beans with lemon dressing ; ingredients: fresh peas, green beans, olive oil, lemon juice, lemon rind, caster sugar, sea salt, cracked pepper, mint ; preparation:Bring a large suacepan of salted water to the boil. Serve over rice, noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: bulghur with red pepper and peas ; ingredients: olive oil, red bell pepper, onion, chicken broth, bulgur, peas, fresh parsley, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: delicious homemade pancake syrup ; ingredients: light brown sugar, white sugar, water, light corn syrup, salt, maple extract ; preparation:In a medium saucepan bring both sugars, water, corn syrup and pinch salt to a boil over medium heat. Then boil for 7 minutes or until slightly thickened. Remove from heat then stir in maple extract. Let cool for about 20 minutes. Serve warm, room temperature or cold. Store covered tightly in a glass jar in refrigerator. ; name: sweet corn pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, half-and-half, sour cream, flour, baking soda, baking powder, corn, vegetable oil ; preparation:Beat the egg whites until they hold soft peaks when the beaters are lifted up. In another bowl, combine the egg yolks, half-and-half, and sour cream. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the egg yolk mixture. Add the beaten egg whites, using a gentle stirring motion to combine them with the yolk mixture. Add the corn and stir gently. Pour a small amount of oil into a non-stick pan and heat it over medium heat. Drop batter, about 1 tablespoon at a time, into the pan for each pancake and cook until golden brown on each side. Serve with butter if desired. ; name: cow pattie cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, butter, milk, cocoa, salt, vanilla, oatmeal, coconut ; preparation:Boil the first five ingredients for 5 minutes. Then add the last three ingredients. Stir. Remove from heat. While hot, drop by spoonful onto waxed paper. ; name: tropical coconut cake ; ingredients: cream of coconut, sweetened condensed milk, crushed pineapple, yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, whipped topping, shredded coconut ; preparation:Bake the cake as directed. Mix the cream of coconut and sweetened condensed milk together. As soon as cake is done, punch a lot of holes in cake. Slowly pour the cream of coconut mixture into holes and all over cake. Pour pineapple, juice and all, over cake. Refrigerate until cold. Mix whipped topping and shredded coconut together and spread over the cake. Keep refrigerated. It must be cold to taste good. Make this the day before you want to eat it. ; name: pancake syrup increaser ; ingredients: granulated sugar, brown sugar, water, maple extract, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan combine the white sugar, brown sugar and water. Bring to a boil, lower heat and simmer stirring for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and maple extract. Cool to almost room temperature then add to your bottle of store-bought syrup. Seal tightly and refrigerate. This will last as long as your bottled pancake syrup. ; name: coconut pancake syrup ; ingredients: coconut milk, cornstarch, light corn syrup, white sugar, sweetened coconut ; preparation:In a large saucepan combine the white sugar, brown sugar and water. name: beet salad with raspberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: beets, sweet onion, olive oil, raspberry vinegar, balsamic vinegar, garlic, salt & fresh ground pepper, fresh chives ; preparation:Place beets and onion in a large bowl. In a cup, combine oil, raspberry vinegar, balsamic vinegar, and garlic. Season with the salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. Pour over the beet mixture and toss well. Sprinkle with the chives. Cover and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes or up to 3 days. ; name: beet salad with goat cheese and walnuts ; ingredients: beets, fresh basil, ground black pepper, vinaigrette dressing, mixed baby greens, walnuts, semi-soft goat cheese ; preparation:Drain and cut up beets. In a medium bowl, combine cut-up beets, basil, and pepper. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons of the salad dressing. Toss to coat. Arrange greens on 2 salad plates. Sprinkle with remaining dressing. Top with beet mixture, walnuts, and goat cheese. ; name: beet and raisin salad ; ingredients: beets, raisins, brown sugar, oil, lemon juice, lettuce leaf, parsley ; preparation:Peel and grate the beets. Chop the raisins coarsely and mix with the beets and the brown sugar. Mix together the oil and lemon juice. Pour over the beets and raisins and mix well. Serve on crisp lettuce leaves sprinkled with chopped parsley. ; name: fresh corn salad with honey lime vinaigrette ; ingredients: fresh lime juice, honey, jalapeno pepper, fresh cilantro, salt, corn, baby spinach, tomatoes, cucumber ; preparation:Whisk together lime juice and honey. Add jalapeno, cilantro, and salt and set aside. Cut corn off cobs leaving some pieces large. Add to dressing. Add spinach, tomato and cucumber and mix well. This salad tastes best after about half an hour when the spinach has wilted and the flavors have had time to meld. ; name: patzaria salata beet salad ; ingredients: beetroots, olive oil, vinegar, salt, garlic ; preparation:Wash the beetroots and the stalks very well under cold running water many times to remove any dirt. Cut the most bottom part of the beet but leave the stalks and upper leaves intact. Boil the beets for 35-45 minutes or until tender, and allow them to cool in their own water. When cool enough to handle, peel the beetroots, and cut them in rounds or quarters. Cut the stems in half or thirds, depending on length. Place the beets and stems in a bowl and dress with the olive oil, vinegar, salt, and 1-2 tablespoons of the water that they were boiled in and mix well. This salad is an excellent accompaniment to fried or broiled fish. ; name: baby beet salad with feta and raspberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: beet, feta cheese, salad greens, raspberry jam, dijon mustard, fresh raspberries, vegetable oil, chives ; preparation:Wash the beetroots and the stalks very well under cold running water many times to remove any dirt. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: chocolate chunked cookies ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, eggs, granulated sugar, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft. ; name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: chocolate syrup ; ingredients: cocoa, sugar, salt, water, corn syrup, vanilla extract ; preparation:Mix cocoa, sugar and salt well. name: orange salad with olives mint ; ingredients: red onion, navel oranges, olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, of fresh mint, kosher salt, black olives ; preparation:Soak onions in ice water for 30 minutes, drain. Meanwhile, peel oranges as directed above, making sure as much of the white pith as possible is removed. Slice, crosswise as thinly as possible and save any juice that accumulates from the slicing. Lay the oranges in a spiral on a platter. Combine the oil, lemon and orange juice with salt, mint and any of the accumulated orange juice. Toss the onion slices over the oranges. Spread the dressing over both evenly. Then sprinkle with olives. ; name: tossed romaine and orange salad ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, romaine lettuce, mandarin oranges, slivered almonds ; preparation:Prepare the dressing by whisking together the orange juice, olive oil, vinegar, pepper and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine the romaine and oranges. Add enough dressing to coat and toss well. Sprinkle with almonds and serve. ; name: moroccan tomato and capsicum salad ; ingredients: red capsicums, green capsicum, egg tomatoes, lemon juice, ground cumin, extra virgin olive oil, parsley, salt ; preparation:Quarter the capsicums, and remove the saeeds and membranes. Roast under a grill or in a very hot oven until the skin blackens and blisters. Place in a paper or plastic bag for about 10 minutes. Peel. Chop the capsicum coarsely. Drop the tomatoes into boiling water, count to ten, then drain and refresh in cold water. Peel and seed, then chop coarsely. Combine the capsicum and tomatoes in a bowl, add the combined remaining ingredients and mix well. ; name: mandarin orange salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, cashews, mandarin oranges, radishes, mayonnaise, gingerroot, seasoned rice vinegar, white pepper ; preparation:Tear lettuce into small bite sized pieces. Combine lettuce, nuts and radishes in a large bowl. Mix the dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Toss the lettuce and dressing and place in serving bowls. Arrange the chilled mandarin orange sections on top and serve. ; name: spicy broccoli salad ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red bell pepper, miniature corn cobs, red onion, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, light brown sugar, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Steam broccoli florets for 2 minutes, then rinse quickly in cold water. Drain well. Place broccoli in serving bowl, adding the onions, bell peppers, and miniature corn. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, oil, brown sugar and red pepper flakes. Just before serving toss dressing with vegetables. Season with salt. ; name: spicy orange salad moroccan style ; ingredients: oranges, cayenne, paprika, garlic, olive oil, red wine, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parsley, black olives ; preparation:Place the dressing in a large bowl, add the onions, bell peppers, and miniature corn. Mix the dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Toss the dressing with vegetables. Season with salt. ; name: sweet potato salad moroccan style ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, cayenne, paprika, garlic, olive oil, red wine, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parsley, black olives ; preparation:Place the dressing in a large bowl, add the onions, bell peppers, and miniature corn. Lay a wonton wrapper on a flat surface and brush a little water around the edge of the wrapper. Place 2 teaspoons of the chicken mixture in the middle of the wrapper. Bring the corners together and pinch the edges together to seal. Repeat with the remaining mixture and wonton wrappers. Heat a pan of hot oil, and deep fry them till they are golden brown. ; name: super bowl burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, dry onion soup mix, potatoes, swiss cheese, mushroom ; preparation:Preheat grill for high heat. In a medium bowl, mix together potato, cheese, and mushrooms. In a large bowl, mix hamburger with onion soup mix. Form into patties. Make a pocket in each hamburger, stuff with potato mix, and seal. When ready to grill, brush grate with oil. Cook over high heat for 3 to 5 minutes on each side. Serve hot. ; name: plum dumplings blommeboller ; ingredients: potatoes, flour, sugar, eggs, salt, butter, plums, sugar cube, breadcrumbs, cinnamon ; preparation:Cook and peel the potatoes. Mash in a large bowl. Add the flour, sugar, eggs, salt and melted butter and mix well to make a dough. Roll out quite thin and cut into rounds the diameter of a teacup. Remove pits from the plums and fill each cavity with a sugar cube. Place 1 filled plum in each round of dough and pinch edges together. Cook in lightly salted boiling water about 10 minutes. While the dumplings are cooking, mix the bread crumbs with the melted butter. When dumplings are cooked, drain and roll in bread-crumb mixture and then in sugar and cinnamon. These are a delicious accompaniment to either roast beef or roast pork. ; name: marge s dumplings ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking powder, shortening, milk ; preparation:Make sure that the stew you are putting these in is boiling. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: fudgecake ; ingredients: biscuit, eggs, butter, caster sugar, cocoa powder, walnuts, sultana, vanilla, chocolate icing ; preparation:Put biscuits in to a plastic bag and seal end, with a rolling pin crush them till they are broken in to small pieces. Lightly beat eggs. In a small pot gently melt butter and stir in the sugar and cocoa. Remove from heat, cool to lukewarm and stir in the eggs. Return to the heat and stir until the mixture is smooth and thick and just starting to boil. Remove from heat and stir in walnuts, sultanas and vanilla. Then stir in biscuit crumbs. Mix well and press lightly into a lightly buttered sponge roll tin. Set aside in a cool place for a couple of hours. Ice with your fav chocolate butter icing and cut into bars. ; name: chocolate fudge pecan pie ; ingredients: chocolate crumb crusts, cornstarch, water, unsweetened chocolate squares, condensed milk, eggs, butter, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, combine cornstarch and water in a small bowl. In saucepan, melt chocolate and condensed milk over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add the cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from the heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. Bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, until a knife inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool on a rack, then cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours. ; name: super easy dark chocolate fudge ; ingredients: nestle semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, walnuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Over low heat, melt the chips in the sweetened condensed milk. Remove from the heat and stir in the nuts and vanilla. Spread evenly into an wax paper lined 8x8 pan. Chill and pop out of pan. Refrigerate and cut into squares. ; name: easy fudge pie ; ingredients: frozen pie crust, sweetened condensed milk, egg, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Add the cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: caramel butter sauce ; ingredients: sugar, water, salt, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream ; preparation:Combine sugar, water, salt, and cream of tartar in a heavy duty 2 quart saucepan. Remove cover, and cook without stirring, to a soft crack stage. Watch carefully for it to turn light amber. If it turns dark amber, it is burnt. Add the butter and whisk it in quickly. Remove from heat. Add cream and whisk it inches. Serve warm over ice cream, fresh fruit, cake, or apple crisp. ; name: unlawfully rich butterscotch sauce ; ingredients: light brown sugar, butter, heavy cream, hazelnut extract ; preparation:In a small, heavy saucepan combine all the ingredients except for the pure extract, if using. Serve warm. ; name: chocolate bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, butter, chocolate chips, eggs, milk, sugar, sherry wine, vanilla ; preparation:Cut crusts from bread. Steam in a large pot of water or asparagus steamer for 3 to 5 minutes, or until crisp-tender. Drain and transfer to a medium bowl and keep warm. Melt butter in a medium skillet. Cook over medium-high heat until butter just begins to brown and foam, being careful not to burn. Remove from heat and stir in garlic. Swirl pan several times, then stir in lemon juice and vinegar. Pour over hot asparagus and season with salt and pepper. Toss gently to mix. Transfer to a platter and sprinkle with thyme and lemon zest, optional. ; name: asparagus with lemon butter ; ingredients: salt, fresh asparagus, butter, seasoned rice vinegar, lemon, zest of ; preparation:Heat salted water to a boil in a large saucepa. Lightly toss with butter, vinegar, lemon zest, and salt to taste. ; name: roasted asparagus with browned butter ; ingredients: asparagus spear, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, butter, lemon juice, garlic, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat over 450 degrees. Place asparagus in a roasting pan. Drizzle iwth olive oil. Sprinkle evenly with salt and pepper. Bake for 8 minutes or until tender-crisp. name: tomato and spinach frittata ; ingredients: baby spinach, onion, garlic cloves, chili flakes, fresh basil, cottage cheese, eggs, roma tomatoes, havarti cheese ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 375f. Lightly spray a baking dish with pam or other no oil spray. Place the cottage cheese in a strainer and drain for 5 minutes. Pack the spinach on the bottom of the dish. Add the sliced onion. Sprinkle on the adobe spice. Combine the eggs and cottage cheese in a food processor and puree until the mixture is very smooth. Pour over the spinach. Arrange the tomato slices on top. Sprinkle on the grated cheese. Bake in 375 oven until golden and the eggs are cooked apprx 25 minutes. ; name: garlic frittata ; ingredients: eggs, milk, parmesan cheese, butter, garlic cloves, onion, polish sausage, potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Beat together the eggs, milk and parmesan cheese. Set aside. In large skillet, over medium heat melt butter and saute garlic, onion, sausage, and potatoes for about 5 minutes or until tender. Reduce heat to medium. Pour egg mixture into pan and cook, without stirring until eggs are almost set. Sprinkle cheddar cheese over top of frittata. Let cook on top of stove for about 1 minute more. Place pan under broiler and broil 6 inches from heat until the top is bubbly and slightly browned. Cut in wedgse to serve. ; name: onion frittata ; ingredients: butter, onions, eggs, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chili ; preparation:Put the butter, garlic, diced chili and onions in a frying pan and fry gently until the onions are a nice golden brown. Beat the six eggs well with the salt and pepper. Scoop the onions out of the pan and mix with the eggs. Melt the extra butter in the pan and pour in the egg mixture. Cook on both sides until browned slice in wedges and serve hot. ; name: spinach ricotta frittata ; ingredients: baby spinach leaves, green onions, button mushrooms, roasted red pepper, fresh basil, butter, eggs, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spray a non-stick 9 or 10 inch omelet pan with cooking spray. Place over medium high heat, add butter. When butter is melted add the prepared vegetables and basil. Cook stirring often just until spinach is wilted. Whisk together the eggs and ricotta cheese. Pour egg mixture over cooked vegetables, cook until almost set, lifting edges frequently to allow uncooked portions to run to bottom of pan. When almost set, reduce heat, cover and allow to cook covered for 1 to 2 minutes. Invert onto a large plate and slip back into pan to finish cooking, top with grated parmesan cheese. At this time you may put the chicken under the broiler to turn the crust to gold.
